code: import React from'react';import{Grid,Paper,Typography,Button,IconButton,Box,Divider}from'@mui/material';import DeleteIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Delete';import EditIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Edit';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AgentList=_ref=>{let{agents,onSelectAgent,onEditAgent,onDeleteAgent}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,children:agents.map(agent=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:2,height:'100%',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",color:"green",gutterBottom:true,children:agent.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{sx:{marginBottom:2,backgroundColor:'rgba(0, 255, 132, 1)'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{position:'absolute',top:4,right:1,display:'flex',gap:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{size:"small",onClick:()=>onEditAgent(agent),color:"primary",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditIcon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{size:"small",onClick:()=>onDeleteAgent(agent.id),color:"error",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteIcon,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle1",color:"primary",gutterBottom:true,children:agent.role}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",paragraph:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Objetivo:"})," ",agent.goal]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",paragraph:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Contexto:"})," ",agent.backstory]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flexGrow:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",fullWidth:true,onClick:()=>onSelectAgent(agent),children:"Selecionar Agente na equipe"})]})},agent.id))});};export default AgentList;
